entries.title: PingLearn AI Math Tutor - Initial Release
entries.description: The revolutionary AI-powered mathematics learning platform that combines voice interaction with beautiful visual learning.
features: 🎯 AI-powered mathematics tutoring with Gemini Live API integration
🎤 LiveKit voice agent for real-time conversational learning
📐 Beautiful KaTeX mathematical equation rendering with SHOW-then-TELL synchronization
🌈 Ethereal shadow backgrounds with seamless multi-color blending
📊 Comprehensive dashboard with real-time learning metrics
🧙‍♂️ Interactive setup wizard for personalized learning experience
📚 Complete NCERT Grade 10 Mathematics curriculum integration
💬 Real-time transcription with intelligent math detection
📱 Fully responsive design for all screen sizes
🎨 Modern glassmorphism UI with ultra-rounded corners
improvements: Zero TypeScript errors with strict mode enforcement
Feature flag system for safe rollouts
